name: 蔡子萱　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生：(一) 認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值 (二) 有效學習 (三) 涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。

The first step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental values of higher education at the college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education. Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to the protection of public health, safety, and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that requires adherence to the highest code of ethics.
schedule:
1. 課程導論
2. 多元學習學分介紹 / 職能測驗
3. 樂在英文學習 (國際會議廳)
4. 工程倫理 (資源化技術案例)
5. 工程倫理 (工程倫理案例)
6. 工程倫理 (同學分享案例)
7. 圖書館 / 紅樓
8.EXCEL 技巧與北科軟體雲介紹
9. 化學課程相關 APP 分享
scorePolicy:
心得 (內容適切，符合校訓：誠樸精勤) 40~60%
課程中互動 20~30%
其他 (作業、練習、出席率等) 10~35%
(實際評量次數與標準  會依課程情況調整)
materials: 教材放置北科 i 學園 PLUS
remarks:
本課程開學後會提供 LINE 官方帳號，同學可由 LINE 官方帳號發問。
After the course starts, the official "Line" account will be announced, and students can ask questions by Line.
